description: This is a web page implementing the UI for a database visualizer tool. It includes layout, styling, and client-side JavaScript logic to load and display databases, tables, and data within tables, providing interactive features like refresh, expand, and navigation.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases when the refresh button is clicked.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the selected database to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for the selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for selected table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML table from data array and injects into DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, with expandability for objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding and collapsing cell content for long strings or objects.
